name: recommendation-engine-ui
description: Management dashboard for the Recommendation Engine

scripts.start: python3 -m http.server 3000 2>/dev/null || python -m SimpleHTTPServer 3000 2>/dev/null || echo 'Python not found, serving at file://$(pwd)/index.html'
scripts.build: echo 'Build complete - static files ready for deployment'

author: Vrooli Recommendation Engine
